actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to waive recovery of certain costs for extraordinary wind and ice damage to certain facilities.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to waive the costs of replacing and relocating the original Salesbury Ridge section of the 138-Kilowatt transmission line in determining the reimbursable costs (for utility rate-setting purposes) of the operation and maintenance of the Crater-Long Lakes division of the Snettisham project near Juneau, Alaska.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to waive recovery of certain costs for extraordinary wind and ice damage to certain facilities.
